description: Comprehensive security rules for Terraform static analysis

rules.name: S3 Bucket Public Read Access
rules.description: S3 bucket should not have public-read ACL
rules.remediation: Remove public-read ACL and use bucket policies for controlled access

rules.name: S3 Bucket Public Write Access
rules.description: S3 bucket should not have public-write ACL
rules.remediation: Remove public-write ACL to prevent unauthorized data modification

rules.name: S3 Bucket Encryption Disabled
rules.description: S3 bucket should have server-side encryption enabled
rules.remediation: Enable server-side encryption using AES256 or KMS

rules.name: S3 Bucket Versioning Disabled
rules.description: S3 bucket should have versioning enabled
rules.remediation: Enable versioning to protect against accidental deletion

rules.name: S3 Bucket Logging Disabled
rules.description: S3 bucket should have access logging enabled
rules.remediation: Enable access logging for audit and compliance

rules.name: S3 Bucket MFA Delete Disabled
rules.description: S3 bucket should have MFA delete enabled for critical data
rules.remediation: Enable MFA delete for additional protection

rules.name: S3 Bucket Public Access Block Disabled
rules.description: S3 bucket should have public access block enabled
rules.remediation: Enable all public access block settings

rules.name: EC2 Instance Public IP
rules.description: EC2 instance should not have public IP unless required
rules.remediation: Use private subnets and NAT gateway for outbound access

rules.name: EC2 Instance Unencrypted EBS
rules.description: EC2 instance should have encrypted EBS volumes
rules.remediation: Enable EBS encryption for data at rest protection

rules.name: EC2 Instance IMDSv1 Enabled
rules.description: EC2 instance should use IMDSv2 only
rules.remediation: Set http_tokens to 'required' to enforce IMDSv2

rules.name: EC2 Instance Monitoring Disabled
rules.description: EC2 instance should have detailed monitoring enabled
rules.remediation: Enable detailed monitoring for better observability

rules.name: EC2 Instance No Key Pair
rules.description: EC2 instance should have a key pair for secure access
rules.remediation: Specify a key pair for secure SSH access

rules.name: Security Group SSH Open to World
rules.description: Security group should not allow SSH (port 22) from 0.0.0.0/0
rules.remediation: Restrict SSH access to specific IP ranges or use bastion hosts

rules.name: Security Group RDP Open to World
rules.description: Security group should not allow RDP (port 3389) from 0.0.0.0/0
rules.remediation: Restrict RDP access to specific IP ranges

rules.name: Security Group Database Port Open
rules.description: Security group should not allow database ports from 0.0.0.0/0
rules.remediation: Restrict database access to application security groups only

rules.name: Security Group All Traffic Outbound
rules.description: Security group should not allow all outbound traffic
rules.remediation: Define specific outbound rules based on requirements

rules.name: Security Group No Description
rules.description: Security group rules should have descriptions
rules.remediation: Add descriptions to all security group rules for documentation

rules.name: IAM Policy Wildcard Actions
rules.description: IAM policy should not use wildcard (*) actions
rules.remediation: Use specific actions following principle of least privilege

rules.name: IAM Policy Wildcard Resources
rules.description: IAM policy should not use wildcard (*) resources
rules.remediation: Specify exact resource ARNs instead of wildcards

rules.name: IAM User Without MFA
rules.description: IAM users should have MFA enabled
rules.remediation: Enable MFA for all IAM users

rules.name: IAM Root Access Keys
rules.description: Root account should not have access keys
rules.remediation: Delete root access keys and use IAM users instead

rules.name: IAM Password Policy Weak
rules.description: IAM password policy should enforce strong passwords
rules.remediation: Set minimum length, complexity, and rotation requirements

rules.name: IAM Role Cross-Account Trust
rules.description: IAM role should not allow cross-account access without conditions
rules.remediation: Add conditions to cross-account trust relationships

rules.name: RDS Instance Public Access
rules.description: RDS instance should not be publicly accessible
rules.remediation: Set publicly_accessible to false

rules.name: RDS Instance Unencrypted
rules.description: RDS instance should have encryption at rest enabled
rules.remediation: Enable storage encryption using KMS

rules.name: RDS Instance No Backup
rules.description: RDS instance should have automated backups enabled
rules.remediation: Set backup retention period to at least 7 days

rules.name: RDS Instance Multi-AZ Disabled
rules.description: RDS instance should have Multi-AZ enabled for production
rules.remediation: Enable Multi-AZ for high availability

rules.name: RDS Instance Deletion Protection Disabled
rules.description: RDS instance should have deletion protection enabled
rules.remediation: Enable deletion protection for production databases

rules.name: VPC Default Security Group Open
rules.description: Default VPC security group should not have open rules
rules.remediation: Remove all rules from default security group

rules.name: VPC Flow Logs Disabled
rules.description: VPC should have flow logs enabled
rules.remediation: Enable VPC flow logs for network monitoring

rules.name: VPC DNS Resolution Disabled
rules.description: VPC should have DNS resolution enabled
rules.remediation: Enable DNS support for proper name resolution

rules.name: CloudTrail Encryption Disabled
rules.description: CloudTrail should have KMS encryption enabled
rules.remediation: Enable KMS encryption for CloudTrail logs

rules.name: CloudTrail Log Validation Disabled
rules.description: CloudTrail should have log file validation enabled
rules.remediation: Enable log file validation to detect tampering

rules.name: CloudTrail Single Region
rules.description: CloudTrail should be multi-region for global coverage
rules.remediation: Enable multi-region trail for comprehensive logging

rules.name: KMS Key Rotation Disabled
rules.description: KMS key should have automatic rotation enabled
rules.remediation: Enable automatic key rotation for better security

rules.name: KMS Key No Deletion Window
rules.description: KMS key should have appropriate deletion window
rules.remediation: Set deletion window to at least 7 days

rules.name: Lambda Function Public Access
rules.description: Lambda function should not allow public access
rules.remediation: Restrict function access to specific principals

rules.name: Lambda Function No Dead Letter Queue
rules.description: Lambda function should have dead letter queue configured
rules.remediation: Configure dead letter queue for error handling

rules.name: Lambda Function No VPC
rules.description: Lambda function should run in VPC when accessing private resources
rules.remediation: Configure VPC settings for functions accessing private resources

rules.name: ELB No SSL Certificate
rules.description: Load balancer should use SSL/TLS certificates
rules.remediation: Configure SSL certificate for HTTPS listeners

rules.name: ELB Access Logs Disabled
rules.description: Load balancer should have access logs enabled
rules.remediation: Enable access logs for audit and troubleshooting

rules.name: ELB Deletion Protection Disabled
rules.description: Load balancer should have deletion protection enabled
rules.remediation: Enable deletion protection for production load balancers

rules.name: CloudFront No HTTPS Redirect
rules.description: CloudFront distribution should redirect HTTP to HTTPS
rules.remediation: Set viewer protocol policy to redirect-to-https

rules.name: CloudFront No WAF
rules.description: CloudFront distribution should have WAF enabled
rules.remediation: Associate WAF web ACL with CloudFront distribution

rules.name: Route53 Query Logging Disabled
rules.description: Route53 hosted zone should have query logging enabled
rules.remediation: Enable query logging for DNS monitoring

rules.name: SNS Topic Not Encrypted
rules.description: SNS topic should have encryption enabled
rules.remediation: Enable KMS encryption for SNS topic

rules.name: SNS Topic Public Access
rules.description: SNS topic should not allow public access
rules.remediation: Restrict topic access to specific principals

rules.name: SQS Queue Not Encrypted
rules.description: SQS queue should have encryption enabled
rules.remediation: Enable KMS encryption for SQS queue

rules.name: SQS Queue Public Access
rules.description: SQS queue should not allow public access
rules.remediation: Restrict queue access to specific principals

rules.name: ElastiCache Cluster Not Encrypted
rules.description: ElastiCache cluster should have encryption enabled
rules.remediation: Enable encryption at rest and in transit

rules.name: ElastiCache No Auth Token
rules.description: ElastiCache Redis cluster should use auth token
rules.remediation: Configure auth token for Redis authentication

rules.name: EKS Cluster Public Endpoint
rules.description: EKS cluster should not have public API endpoint
rules.remediation: Disable public access or restrict CIDR blocks

rules.name: EKS Cluster No Logging
rules.description: EKS cluster should have control plane logging enabled
rules.remediation: Enable control plane logging for audit and troubleshooting

rules.name: ECS Task Definition Privileged
rules.description: ECS task definition should not run in privileged mode
rules.remediation: Remove privileged mode and use specific capabilities

rules.name: ECS Task Definition Root User
rules.description: ECS task definition should not run as root user
rules.remediation: Specify non-root user in container definition

rules.name: API Gateway No WAF
rules.description: API Gateway should have WAF enabled
rules.remediation: Associate WAF web ACL with API Gateway

rules.name: API Gateway No Logging
rules.description: API Gateway should have access logging enabled
rules.remediation: Enable access logging for API Gateway stage

rules.name: CloudWatch Log Group Not Encrypted
rules.description: CloudWatch log group should have encryption enabled
rules.remediation: Enable KMS encryption for log group

rules.name: CloudWatch Log Group No Retention
rules.description: CloudWatch log group should have retention policy
rules.remediation: Set appropriate log retention period

rules.name: Config Service Disabled
rules.description: AWS Config should be enabled for compliance monitoring
rules.remediation: Enable AWS Config for resource compliance monitoring

rules.name: GuardDuty Disabled
rules.description: GuardDuty should be enabled for threat detection
rules.remediation: Enable GuardDuty for threat detection and monitoring

rules.name: Secrets Manager No Rotation
rules.description: Secrets Manager secret should have automatic rotation
rules.remediation: Enable automatic rotation for secrets

rules.name: Secrets Manager No KMS
rules.description: Secrets Manager secret should use customer managed KMS key
rules.remediation: Use customer managed KMS key for encryption

rules.name: S3 Bucket Lifecycle Policy Missing
rules.description: S3 bucket should have lifecycle policy for cost optimization
rules.remediation: Configure lifecycle policy to transition or expire objects

rules.name: S3 Bucket Cross-Region Replication Missing
rules.description: Critical S3 buckets should have cross-region replication
rules.remediation: Enable cross-region replication for disaster recovery

rules.name: S3 Bucket Object Lock Disabled
rules.description: S3 bucket should have object lock for compliance data
rules.remediation: Enable object lock for immutable data storage

rules.name: EC2 Instance No IAM Role
rules.description: EC2 instance should have IAM role instead of access keys
rules.remediation: Attach IAM role to EC2 instance for secure access

rules.name: EC2 Instance Outdated AMI
rules.description: EC2 instance should use recent AMI versions
rules.remediation: Use recent AMI versions with latest security patches

rules.name: EC2 Instance No Termination Protection
rules.description: Production EC2 instances should have termination protection
rules.remediation: Enable termination protection for production instances

rules.name: Security Group Allows FTP
rules.description: Security group should not allow FTP (ports 20-21)
rules.remediation: Use SFTP or FTPS instead of plain FTP

rules.name: Security Group Allows Telnet
rules.description: Security group should not allow Telnet (port 23)
rules.remediation: Use SSH instead of Telnet for secure remote access

rules.name: Security Group Allows SNMP
rules.description: Security group should not allow SNMP (port 161) from internet
rules.remediation: Restrict SNMP access to management networks only

rules.name: IAM User Console Access Without MFA
rules.description: IAM users with console access should require MFA
rules.remediation: Enforce MFA for all console users

rules.name: IAM Access Key Rotation Missing
rules.description: IAM access keys should be rotated regularly
rules.remediation: Implement access key rotation policy

rules.name: IAM Group Without Users
rules.description: IAM groups should have users assigned
rules.remediation: Remove unused IAM groups or assign users

rules.name: RDS Instance No Performance Insights
rules.description: RDS instance should have Performance Insights enabled
rules.remediation: Enable Performance Insights for database monitoring

rules.name: RDS Instance No Enhanced Monitoring
rules.description: RDS instance should have enhanced monitoring enabled
rules.remediation: Enable enhanced monitoring for detailed metrics

rules.name: RDS Instance Default Port
rules.description: RDS instance should not use default database ports
rules.remediation: Use non-default ports to reduce attack surface

rules.name: VPC No Network ACLs
rules.description: VPC should have custom Network ACLs for additional security
rules.remediation: Implement custom Network ACLs for subnet-level security

rules.name: VPC Peering No Route Tables
rules.description: VPC peering should have specific route table entries
rules.remediation: Configure specific routes for peering connections

rules.name: Lambda Function No Reserved Concurrency
rules.description: Critical Lambda functions should have reserved concurrency
rules.remediation: Set reserved concurrency for critical functions

rules.name: Lambda Function No X-Ray Tracing
rules.description: Lambda function should have X-Ray tracing enabled
rules.remediation: Enable X-Ray tracing for better observability

rules.name: Lambda Function High Memory
rules.description: Lambda function memory should be optimized
rules.remediation: Optimize memory allocation based on function requirements

rules.name: ELB No Connection Draining
rules.description: Classic Load Balancer should have connection draining enabled
rules.remediation: Enable connection draining for graceful shutdowns

rules.name: ELB No Health Check
rules.description: Load balancer should have proper health checks configured
rules.remediation: Configure appropriate health check parameters

rules.name: ELB Cross-Zone Load Balancing Disabled
rules.description: Load balancer should have cross-zone load balancing enabled
rules.remediation: Enable cross-zone load balancing for better distribution

rules.name: CloudFront No Origin Access Identity
rules.description: CloudFront should use Origin Access Identity for S3 origins
rules.remediation: Use Origin Access Identity to secure S3 bucket access

rules.name: CloudFront No Geo Restrictions
rules.description: CloudFront should have geo restrictions if required
rules.remediation: Configure geo restrictions based on business requirements

rules.name: CloudFront No Custom Error Pages
rules.description: CloudFront should have custom error pages configured
rules.remediation: Configure custom error pages to avoid information disclosure

rules.name: Route53 No Health Checks
rules.description: Route53 records should have health checks for failover
rules.remediation: Configure health checks for critical DNS records

rules.name: Route53 DNSSEC Disabled
rules.description: Route53 hosted zone should have DNSSEC enabled
rules.remediation: Enable DNSSEC for DNS security

rules.name: SNS Topic No Dead Letter Queue
rules.description: SNS topic should have dead letter queue for failed deliveries
rules.remediation: Configure dead letter queue for message reliability

rules.name: SQS Queue No Dead Letter Queue
rules.description: SQS queue should have dead letter queue configured
rules.remediation: Configure dead letter queue for message handling

rules.name: SQS Queue Long Polling Disabled
rules.description: SQS queue should use long polling to reduce costs
rules.remediation: Enable long polling to reduce API calls and costs

rules.name: ElastiCache No Automatic Failover
rules.description: ElastiCache Redis should have automatic failover enabled
rules.remediation: Enable automatic failover for high availability

rules.name: ElastiCache No Backup
rules.description: ElastiCache Redis should have backup enabled
rules.remediation: Enable automatic backups for data protection

rules.name: EKS Cluster No Private Endpoint
rules.description: EKS cluster should have private endpoint access enabled
rules.remediation: Enable private endpoint access for secure cluster communication

rules.name: EKS Node Group No Remote Access
rules.description: EKS node group should restrict remote access
rules.remediation: Restrict SSH access to EKS worker nodes

rules.name: ECS Service No Load Balancer
rules.description: ECS service should use load balancer for high availability
rules.remediation: Configure load balancer for ECS service

rules.name: ECS Task Definition No Health Check
rules.description: ECS task definition should have health checks
rules.remediation: Configure health checks for container monitoring

rules.name: API Gateway No Throttling
rules.description: API Gateway should have throttling configured
rules.remediation: Configure throttling to prevent API abuse

rules.name: API Gateway No API Key
rules.description: API Gateway should require API keys for access control
rules.remediation: Require API keys for access control

rules.name: CloudWatch No Alarms
rules.description: Critical resources should have CloudWatch alarms
rules.remediation: Configure CloudWatch alarms for monitoring

rules.name: CloudWatch Dashboard Missing
rules.description: CloudWatch dashboard should be configured for monitoring
rules.remediation: Create CloudWatch dashboard for operational visibility

rules.name: AWS Backup Plan Missing
rules.description: Critical resources should have AWS Backup plan
rules.remediation: Configure AWS Backup plan for data protection

rules.name: Backup Vault Not Encrypted
rules.description: AWS Backup vault should be encrypted
rules.remediation: Enable encryption for backup vault

rules.name: WAF Web ACL Missing
rules.description: Web applications should have WAF protection
rules.remediation: Configure WAF web ACL for application protection

rules.name: WAF No Rate Limiting
rules.description: WAF should have rate limiting rules
rules.remediation: Configure rate limiting rules in WAF

rules.name: Shield Advanced Not Enabled
rules.description: Critical resources should have Shield Advanced protection
rules.remediation: Enable Shield Advanced for DDoS protection

rules.name: Macie Not Enabled
rules.description: S3 buckets with sensitive data should have Macie enabled
rules.remediation: Enable Macie for data discovery and protection

rules.name: Inspector Not Enabled
rules.description: EC2 instances should have Inspector enabled
rules.remediation: Enable Inspector for vulnerability assessment

rules.name: SSM Session Manager Not Configured
rules.description: EC2 instances should use SSM Session Manager
rules.remediation: Configure SSM Session Manager for secure access

rules.name: SSM Patch Manager Not Configured
rules.description: EC2 instances should have patch management configured
rules.remediation: Configure SSM Patch Manager for automated patching

rules.name: ACM Certificate Not Used
rules.description: SSL/TLS certificates should use ACM
rules.remediation: Use ACM for SSL/TLS certificate management

rules.name: ACM Certificate No Validation
rules.description: ACM certificate should have domain validation
rules.remediation: Configure domain validation for ACM certificates

rules.name: Directory Service Not Encrypted
rules.description: AWS Directory Service should be encrypted
rules.remediation: Enable encryption for Directory Service

rules.name: WorkSpaces Not Encrypted
rules.description: WorkSpaces should have encryption enabled
rules.remediation: Enable encryption for WorkSpaces volumes

rules.name: FSx File System Not Encrypted
rules.description: FSx file system should be encrypted
rules.remediation: Enable encryption for FSx file systems

rules.name: EFS File System Not Encrypted
rules.description: EFS file system should be encrypted
rules.remediation: Enable encryption for EFS file systems

rules.name: EFS No Backup Policy
rules.description: EFS file system should have backup policy
rules.remediation: Configure backup policy for EFS file systems

rules.name: Glue Data Catalog Not Encrypted
rules.description: Glue Data Catalog should be encrypted
rules.remediation: Enable encryption for Glue Data Catalog

rules.name: Athena Query Results Not Encrypted
rules.description: Athena query results should be encrypted
rules.remediation: Enable encryption for Athena query results

rules.name: Kinesis Stream Not Encrypted
rules.description: Kinesis stream should be encrypted
rules.remediation: Enable server-side encryption for Kinesis streams

rules.name: Kinesis Firehose Not Encrypted
rules.description: Kinesis Firehose should be encrypted
rules.remediation: Enable encryption for Kinesis Firehose

rules.name: MSK Cluster Not Encrypted
rules.description: MSK cluster should have encryption enabled
rules.remediation: Enable encryption in transit and at rest for MSK

rules.name: Batch Compute Environment No VPC
rules.description: Batch compute environment should use VPC
rules.remediation: Configure Batch compute environment in VPC

rules.name: EMR Cluster Not Encrypted
rules.description: EMR cluster should have encryption enabled
rules.remediation: Enable encryption at rest and in transit for EMR

rules.name: EMR Cluster Public Access
rules.description: EMR cluster should not be publicly accessible
rules.remediation: Deploy EMR cluster in private subnets

rules.name: Redshift Cluster Not Encrypted
rules.description: Redshift cluster should be encrypted
rules.remediation: Enable encryption for Redshift cluster

rules.name: Redshift Cluster Public Access
rules.description: Redshift cluster should not be publicly accessible
rules.remediation: Set publicly_accessible to false for Redshift

rules.name: DocumentDB Cluster Not Encrypted
rules.description: DocumentDB cluster should be encrypted
rules.remediation: Enable storage encryption for DocumentDB

rules.name: Neptune Cluster Not Encrypted
rules.description: Neptune cluster should be encrypted
rules.remediation: Enable storage encryption for Neptune
